column5: Several years ago on a web site (don't think it was this one) I ran across a die hard Pike fisherman. He took trips to Pike lakes, often with his wife. I think he also was a writer. (Not Mike Borger) Anyway he sold Pike Spoons on his web site also. I know it's not much to go on but I'm hoping somebody can point me in the right direction. I wanna say his first name was Jack, but won't swear to it. Any help is appreciated.
http://jackpennyoutdoors.com/Jack Penny and Mike Borger are friends.
Yep!!!!! Thats the guy. Thank you very, very much.
I see his web site is 2012. Do you know if Jack is still active?
My last contact with Jack was in December 2015. He was going strong then and was planning trips for 2016.I haven't run across any recent articles written by Jack Penny.
I sent a email to the address on his web site. Hopefully all is well with them.
He was active on Mike B's site last year. I am sure Mike B has his info.
I heard back from Jack. All is well. Thanks for the help guys.
